text: Ali Nilforoshan (born 1 September 1975) is an Iranian equestrian. He competed in the individual jumping event at the 2000 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Iranian male equestrians Category:Olympic equestrians of Iran Category:Equestrians at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:Equestrians at the 2002 Asian Games
title: Ali Nilforoshan
